DefaultEvent.Description: A small but determined battalion of angry rodents answers your return with steely resolve.
DefaultEvent.Name: Strength in numbers

ChildBranches.Name: Force your way in
ChildBranches.Description: How can mere rodents hope to keep you out?

DefaultEvent.Description: The Admiralty is unlikely to come and trounce the uppity little buggers. Still, it's worth a try.
DefaultEvent.Name: "Grave foreign threat. Recommend immediate invasion."

ChildBranches.Name: Compile a Port Report
ChildBranches.Description: It will mostly be about closed gates.

DefaultEvent.Description: Straight to the food silos. Oh, how very unfortunate.
DefaultEvent.Name: The blemmigan scampers away

ChildBranches.Name: Release a blemmigan
ChildBranches.Description: One more pest can hardly make a difference in this place.

DefaultEvent.Description: You cannot get into town to make your delivery. You will have to take it to Khan's Heart instead.
DefaultEvent.Name: Turned away

ChildBranches.Name: A delivery for Mr Sacks
ChildBranches.Description: This should be far enough from London.

Description: The gates of the port are closed. Your welcome has been rescinded.
Name: Exiled From Pigmote Isle
